results.description: Vacancy on Southern Health and Disability Ethics Committee Health and Disability Ethics Committees (HDECs) are Ministerial advisory committees established under section 11 of the Public Health and Disability Act 2000. There are four HDECs, based in Auckland (Northern A HDEC), Auckland (Northern B HDEC), Wellington (Central HDEC) and Christchurch (Southern HDEC).
